nodes.text: The Masterline-70 OcTerminal was a system created by Rikhous. During the Caamas Document Crisis, New Republic Crypt Chief Zakarisz Ghent used a Masterline-70 OcTerminal at the Ubiqtorate station orbiting the planet Yaga Minor as part of his work to attempt to recover an original copy of the document.
The Masterline-70 OcTerminal was mentioned in the 1998 novel Vision of the Future, written by Timothy Zahn.
